name: Ridevery
description:
We present to you the exciting game Ridevery, which will take you into the exciting world of delivering the most delicious and aromatic pizza in the world!
In the game you have to become the fastest and most reliable pizza delivery guy, conquering realistic city streets on your high-speed scooter. Upgrade your vehicle to the maximum and go carry out orders, each of which is a real test of dexterity and skill.
Start your career with simple orders and gradually increase your level to become a real pro in the world of pizza delivery. But be careful - one small collision with an obstacle or loss of control of the scooter can damage the pizza, which will affect your profits. However, if you can deliver your order safe and sound, then you will receive a double reward!
Don't forget to save your progress - click on the save icon on the screen to protect yourself from losing your achievements. Complete all levels of development of your scooter and overcome all challenges to become the best in our game!
In order to complete the game you need to upgrade your motorcycle to the last level.
But that is not all! Ridevery has many interesting achievements that will be a real challenge for any player. Test your strength and compete with other players for a place in the online leaderboard!
